title: Kev's spicy vegetable little kicker soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, roughly chopped', '2 sticks celery, roughly chopped', '2 carrots, peeled and roughly chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1/2 teaspoon ground coriander', '175g red lentils', '3 to 4 red peppers, seeded and roughly chopped', '1.5L vegetable stock', '1 (400g) tin chopped plum tomatoes', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 whole fresh chilli, chopped (seeds optional)']
